name: Mathematics for Data Science I
description: Foundational Math concepts including Set theory, Functions, Algebra and basics of Calculus.

name: Statistics for Data Science I
description: Introduction to descriptive statistics, data visualization, and basic probability theory.

name: Computational Thinking
description: Building the logic for programming through flowcharts, pseudocode and dataset analysis.

name: English I
description: Enhancing basic English communication skills for academic and professional settings.

name: Mathematics for Data Science II
description: Advanced math concepts focusing on Linear Algebra for Data Science.

name: Statistics for Data Science II
description: Deep dive into inferential statistics and hypothesis testing.

name: Programming in Python
description: Comprehensive introduction to Python programming language.

name: English II
description: Advanced communication and critical thinking skills.
